content.text:
<thinking>The user wants to verify the health status of the account services. To properly address this:

1. Need to check both Account Agent and Ledger Agent health
2. Previous attempt used parallel tool calls but user rephrased request
3. Health checks don't require account numbers - system-level verification
4. Must confirm both services are operational before reporting status

Since health checks are system-wide and both agents need verification, I'll re-run the parallel health checks for both Account and Ledger services using their respective tools with "health check" queries.</thinking>
